markdownRemark.html: I have beem considering building a standing desk on the cheap. I read an article where you can get all the parts from Ikea like for $20 bucks and just make your own. The official Veridesk ones are like a grand and even the one that you put on top of your existing desk runs $300. So yeah, not in my budget at all. Probably need a stool kinda thing in case I get tired standing as well, the veridesk one is insane.
